TopicTitle: All craft files from the last 2 days were auto deleted by the game with no warning

Articles.Content:
edit: False alarm.

If you have this happen, check that you don't have more than one install of KSP somewhere. Also back up your save files to different drives.

Edited August 17, 2013 by Jason_25
I have not sorry, were they all in the Default profile and you accidentally started a new Default?
